statements: SELECT * FROM STEM_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_type = 'Workshop' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_type='Workshop';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_type='Conference' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_type='Seminar';
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM STEM_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_instructor FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_description LIKE '%beginner%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT workshop_instructor, workshop_date FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-05-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events JOIN Workshops ON STEM_Events.event_id = Workshops.workshop_id WHERE STEM_Events.event_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT event_name, workshop_name, workshop_date FROM STEM_Events INNER JOIN Workshops ON STEM_Events.event_id = Workshops.workshop_id WHERE workshop_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT event_name AS Event, workshop_date AS 'Workshop Date' FROM STEM_Events LEFT JOIN Workshops ON STEM_Events.event_id = Workshops.workshop_id WHERE workshop_instructor = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT event_date, event_name FROM STEM_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_instructor FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_description FROM Extracurricular_Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Sports';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_instructor FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date < '2023-06-15';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM Extracurricular_Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Sport';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_duration FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM STEM_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, timing, organizer FROM Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE registered_event_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location, organizer FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor, workshop_date FROM Workshops WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, timing FROM Activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT participant_name, event_name, participant_phone FROM Participants JOIN STEM_Events ON Participants.registered_event_id = STEM_Events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE participant_role = 'Student';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, activity_location FROM Extracurricular_Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Sport';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_facilitator, workshop_description FROM Workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM STEM_Events;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_role = 'Student';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_facilitator FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description, activity_location FROM Extracurricular_Activities WHERE activity_type = 'Sports' AND activity_date < '2022-06-01';

SELECT R.registration_id, E.event_name, P.participant_name, R.registration_date FROM Registrations R JOIN STEM_Events E ON R.event_id = E.event_id JOIN Participants P ON R.participant_id = P.participant_id WHERE R.registration_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY R.registration_date ASC;
